content.paragraph: This interaction simply adds text into a clickable post-it note. It is useful for displaying dot points of information in a visual manner.

list.point: Ducks have a beak, they like to swim and have oily feathers.
Dogs bark loudly and make very good protectors of your property.
Cats enjoy sleeping, have sharp claws and meow loudly.
Pigs love mud, live on a farm and are used to make Bacon.
Cows are used to make milk, butter and cream and they moo all day.

content.instruction: Click each post-it note above to discover more.
